_description: ‘Of manis mortalite’ by William Dunbar — six 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘Quod tu in cinerem reverteris’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Memento homo quod cinis esThink man þow art bot erde and
                    as…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…To hald thy saule with him on lyveQuod tu in cinerem
                    reuerteris
